    public class BlackJackDealerAI
extends BlackJackPlayer

    • Method Detail

      • doHit

        public java.lang.Boolean doHit()
        Decides if the dealer should hit based on current hand value. Uses Vegas style, hit when less than 17.
        Specified by:
        doHit in class BlackJackPlayer
        Returns:
        If Dealer should hit

      • doSplit

        public java.lang.Boolean doSplit()
        Decides if the dealer should split based on current hand values. Uses Vegas style rules, dealer never splits.
        Specified by:
        doSplit in class BlackJackPlayer
        Returns:
        False since Dealer does not split

      • determineBet

        public int determineBet()
        Decides what value to bet with. Uses Vegas style rules, dealer does not bet.
        Specified by:
        determineBet in class BlackJackPlayer
        Returns:
        0 since Dealer does not bet
